channel.title: add-apt-repository ppa
channel.description: Hello. I installed Kickdecure on host and everything works well. but I can't add add-apt-repository ppa repositories. No connection but internet works. For example: Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/add-apt-repository", line 362, in <module> sys.exit(0 if addaptrepo.main() else 1) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "/usr/bin/add-apt-repository", line 345, in main shortcut = handler(source, **shortcut_params) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/softwareproperties/shortcuts.py", line 40, in shortcut_handler return handler(shortcut, **kwargs) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/softwareproperties/ppa.py", line 86, in __init__ if self.lpppa.publish_debug_symbols: ^^^^^^^^^^ File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/softwareproperties/ppa.py", line 126, in lpppa self._lpppa = self.lpteam.getPPAByName(name=self.ppaname) ^^^^^^^^^^^ File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/softwareproperties/ppa.py", line 113, in lpteam self._lpteam = self.lp.people(self.teamname) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'people' zsh: exit 1 sudo add-apt-repository ppa:apandada1/brightness-controller

item.title: add-apt-repository ppa
item.dc:creator: linuxer
item.description:
Thank you very much! You have helped me. Your Whonix and Kicksecure operating systems are excellent! I recommend it to all my friends, because I have not seen more secure and convenient linux distributions.

item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Kicksecure – 1 Oct 23

Utilize Search Engines and Documentation

Avoid basic questions. Effective use of search engines. Utilizing extensive Kicksecure documentation.

linuxer:

AttributeError: ‘NoneType’ object has no attribute ‘people’

askubuntu.com

Adding opencpn repository - AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'people'

python, add-apt-repository
asked by SPRBRN on 07:02PM - 01 Aug 23 UTC

item.title: add-apt-repository ppa
item.dc:creator: linuxer
item.description:
Hello. I installed Kickdecure on host and everything works well. but I can’t add add-apt-repository ppa repositories. No connection but internet works. For example:
Traceback (most recent call last):
File “/usr/bin/add-apt-repository”, line 362, in
sys.exit(0 if addaptrepo.main() else 1)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
File “/usr/bin/add-apt-repository”, line 345, in main
shortcut = handler(source, **shortcut_params)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
File “/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/softwareproperties/shortcuts.py”, line 40, in shortcut_handler
return handler(shortcut, **kwargs)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
File “/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/softwareproperties/ppa.py”, line 86, in init
if self.lpppa.publish_debug_symbols:
^^^^^^^^^^
File “/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/softwareproperties/ppa.py”, line 126, in lpppa
self._lpppa = self.lpteam.getPPAByName(name=self.ppaname)
^^^^^^^^^^^
File “/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/softwareproperties/ppa.py”, line 113, in lpteam
self._lpteam = self.lp.people(self.teamname)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
AttributeError: ‘NoneType’ object has no attribute ‘people’
zsh: exit 1 sudo add-apt-repository ppa:apandada1/brightness-controller

Read full topic
